channel.title: RuneLyfe Server development team
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape Glabay here,
A friend and I are starting our 474 server development team and we are looking for the best and the brightest coders and programmers to help us on our goal to make the greatest and first 474 Private Server.
We have been working on for some time now and we are now looking for a team to help us get farther.
[b]Current Achievements:[/b]
~Full NPC Combat ~Autospawn.cfg ~Item.cfg ~Doors.cfg ~Objects.cfg ~50% working doors ~Player save
We need the following kinds of people:
Coders
You must be experienced in Java
Application:
[b]Name:
Experience:
Reason we should pick you:
Position:[/b]
[b]Staff List:
Owners:[/b]
Nightleaf Glabay / Omg A Puppy
[b]Coders:[/b] ~Glabay ~Nightleaf ~
[b]Programmers:[/b]
~Glabay ~Nightleaf
[b]In-Game Staff
Owners:[/b] ~Nightleaf ~Glabay
[b]Administrators:[/b] ~ ~ ~
[b]Player Moderators:[/b] ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
[b]Forum Staff
Administrators:[/b] ~Nightleaf ~Glabay
[b]Forum Moderator:[/b] ~ ~
That is it for now; apply now to join the team before its too late we ONLY take the best of the best. You will be notified via Private Message and your name will be added to the list if you get accepted.
Thank you
Your friendly RuneLyfe staff :cool: :)
